item.title: Zero Waste Map
item.description: https://zerowastemap.app (opening soon) Manifesto (draft) Zero Waste Map is for all independantly or co-owned structures that apply to the zero waste movement. Substantial quantity of goods available in bulk (stored in jars, tanks and others containers) is a required condition for grocery stores, markets, coops to appear on the map. Absense of disposable plastic bags and being 100% zerowaste friendly is required too. Some stores will still appear on the map even though they still sell a lot of goods wraped in plastic (often meats and some dried goods) as long as long as other conditions are met.
